wikipedia_page.main: George Millar (1874 – unknown) was a Scottish footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He played for Glasgow Perthshire, Chatham Town, and Manchester United.

response: * George Millar (writer) (1910–2005), awarded the MC for his escape during World War II which he wrote about in Horned Pigeon
* George Millar (singer), singer, songwriter and guitarist with The Irish Rovers
